name: Personal Lock Pick
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Lock Pick" "95577" #L "ID-extractor" "156339" #L "Expendable Hologram Camera" "156054" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ ID-extractor + Expendable Hologram Camera = #L "ID-data" "156340" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ ID-data + Lock Pick = #L "Personal Lock Pick" "156639" Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ This recipe is simplest to make, even a lvl 1 can make it. In fact i don't know which skill is used... It transforms your Standard Lockpick in a NODROP one and nothing else. By this way, you can make a bag NODROP too by putting your lockpick inside.
